body: Wrong tag its virginity not defloration
English version on ehentai right now at: https://e-hentai.org/g/2044307/cc70e37b7d/

Story (repost): MC (Tosaka) and his friend are looking at AV vids at a company party. FMC (Tachibana) comes in and Tosaka comments on Tachibana's outfit, which stands out as usual. Some flirting between the two, Tosaka's friend asks what AV girl he likes, Tachibana suggests one that maybe looks like her. Post-party, they sit and continue to drink together in park, Tachibana complains about company ppl talking shit about how she dresses even tho there's no dress code at work, that she should dress more like an adult, she's not cool. Tosaka disagrees, he thinks she's cool dressing up however she likes. Tachibana then asks if she's "compatible" to him cuz he's "compatible" to her. Cut back inside a bathroom having sex and "hentai play." Like an AV situation, they even do it near someone. Next day, Tosaka stops wearing glasses, Tachibana wears a a sexy adult outfit that gets a lot of flustered attention from guys. Tosaka then gets a text from her "Where should we do it next?"
